ILEX: How Projection Walls Work
2
1
ILEX: Projection walls allow Nomai to talk to each other without being in the same place. It's a wonderful technology for talking to friends that are far away!
3
2
ILEX: To use a projection wall, a projection stone must first be placed into its pedestal. This allows the projection wall to connect to the projection wall corresponding to the projection stone.
4
3
ILEX: Incoming messages from the other projection wall are always displayed in orange spirals! This makes it easy to always tell which side is talking.
5
4
FILIX: Well done, Ilex! But, did you know that projection walls were recreated after the way our Vessel's communications used to work?
6
5
ILEX: Really? I never knew that!
7
6
FILIX: It's true! Though unable to connect to the Vessel's communication network, projection walls are an iteration on their design, which displayed incoming and outgoing messages on separate walls.

ILEX: New projection stones are crafted at the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> every day, allowing us to share conversations with, and project to more and more places!
